caption.title: Impact of consumption of L. paracasei CNCM I-1518 on gut microbiota.
caption.p: (A) Alpha-diversity measured by number of OTUs before and after influenza infection. (B) Weighted Unifrac PcoA before and after infection infection (D0, D3 and D7). (C) Relative abundance (%) of Allobaculum through the experiment. (D) Relative abundance (%) of Prevotella through the experiment.
